title: GPA in higher semesters
content: Why is it that people tell its difficult to score a high gpa after the first year?

comments.body: My SGPAs got significantly better after first year so it's very subjective and I'm not sure we can make a blanket statement like that.
I hope thatâ€™s the case for me too ðŸ˜–

According to me, it's because you are very new to the entire college study routine..

You need to get used to the entire new form of studying

For me it was the opposite - higher sems were easier to score in than the first two. A lot of it has to do with just liking what you're studying, atleast for me.

That being said, it also depends on what you're studying. I don't think anyone will disagree with me when I say that ECE is the hardest engineering major and CSE is the easiest (and I did CSE lol)
